H0.text: Trinidad lies opposite the delta of which major river. Amazon River

H1.text: Trinidad lies opposite the delta of which major river. Magdalena River

H2.text: Trinidad lies opposite the delta of which major river. Essequibo River

H3.text: Trinidad lies opposite the delta of which major river. Orinoco

A4.text: The Orinoco Delta is a vast river delta of the Orinoco River, located in eastern Venezuela.

A5.text: The Orinoco Delta is a vast river delta of the Orinoco River.
